body:
It may just be clearer to return constants here. The byte sizes for TensorFlow data types are fixed, so let's return those?

```java
case FLOAT:
case INT32:
   return 4;
case DOUBLE:
case INT64:
  return 8;
case BOOL:
  return 1;
```
body_html:
It may just be clearer to return constants here. The byte sizes for TensorFlow data types are fixed, so let's return those?

case FLOAT:
case INT32:
   return 4;
case DOUBLE:
case INT64:
  return 8;
case BOOL:
  return 1;
